headline: Mar Vista’s U.S. Quality Strategy Divested Its Stake in Equifax (EFX)
summary: Mar Vista Investment Partners, LLC, an investment management company, released its “Mar Vista U.S. Quality Strategy” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. US equities experienced a strong momentum in 2025 and marked their second consecutive year of double-digit gains. headline: Mar Vista U.S. Quality Primer Q4 2025 Portfolio Update
summary: During the quarter, we initiated new investments in Taiwan Semiconductor and Netflix, while exiting positions in Equifax and Roper Technologies due to fundamental issues. Read more here.

headline: Does Weakening Margins And Profitability Trends Change The Bull Case For Equifax (EFX)?
summary: In recent months, Equifax has faced pressure as its adjusted operating margin and return on invested capital both moved lower, while earnings per share growth lagged despite revenue increases. This combination of weaker profitability metrics and rising concerns over expense management has led market participants to reassess the resilience of Equifax’s business model. We’ll now examine how Equifax’s declining margins and softer profitability trends may reshape its previously optimistic...

headline: Mar Vista U.S. Quality Q4 2025 Portfolio Update
